biotools.summary: An R/Shiny package for visualizing ecological data. It provides a visual interface for generating a wide variety of plots, including histograms, scatterplots, bar plots, stacked bar plots, PCoA plots, cluster dendrograms, and heatmaps.

bioschemas.name: Seed
bioschemas.summary: An R/Shiny package for visualizing ecological data. It provides a visual interface for generating a wide variety of plots, including histograms, scatterplots, bar plots, stacked bar plots, PCoA plots, cluster dendrograms, and heatmaps.
